name: EtherCAT
description: 2-port EtherCAT switch, supports CoE (CANopen over EtherCAT) for real-time motion.

name: Modbus RTU
description: 2-port RS485 communication for Modbus RTU protocol.

name: Modbus TCP/IP
description: 2-port EtherNet switch for Modbus TCP/IP communication.

name: PROFINET RT
description: 2-port EtherNet switch for PROFINET RT communication.

name: TTL_Signal
